item.description:
a concert series with live music from national and regional headliners, which attracts after work crowds and families. Columbus Park is the place to be during the summer as Stamford Downtown produces great music, great dancing and great times!


The Beach Boys hmmmm lets just put it this way I am a California Girl, I grew up surfing, partying and listening to the Beach boys. When you think of summer you think of the Beach Boys :-)

I will organize the food so we can do a light dinner picnic while groovin to the music

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "The Beach Boys & The Wanderers" Stamford in the Park Concerts
